text: The revered NBC News anchor accused of unwanted advances pens a strenuous denial and defense of his legacy. Tom Brokaw, the NBC News anchor who has served as a distinguished anchor emeritus since stepping down as anchor of Nightly News in 2004, penned a blistering rebuttal to accusations that he subjected an underling to unwanted advances in the 1990s, when he was the network's biggest star and she was a 28 - year - old just starting out in network news.
